item.description:
Come hang out with us after work on Friday for drinks and tapas at "Tapeo" in Backbay. This is a chance to simply wind-down at the end of the week and have a bit of fun meeting some new people!

Tapeo has been highly recommended with good drinks and food, plus a great patio. Come check it out before the summer is over!

--------------------------------

For over thirteen years, Tapeo has established itself as one Newbury Streets most prominent restaurants. Located in the heart of Back Bay, Tapeo offers an exceptional Spanish Tapas style cuisine situated in a cozy European atmosphere. Tapeo offers over 40 regional Tapas and desserts with new additions every six weeks including a comprehensive Spanish wine, sherry and spirits list.

Eric Grossman of CitySearch calls Tapeo “Easily the city’s most popular Spanish restaurant” while The Weekly Dig labels Tapeo ‘Best Small Plate’. In addition, Tapeo is highly regarded by Zagat.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the bar or on the patio (Bernadette cell: 617-372-3557)
item.name: End-of-Week Drinks at Tapeo!
